Council Member Annabel Eads
---------------------------

#### Term expires: May 2027

**Phone:**
817-685-1411, ext. 5 |
**Email:**
[place5@eulesstx.gov](https://forms.eulesstx.gov/Forms/CouncilContact?Contact=place5@eulesstx.gov)

![Updated Place 5 Annabel Eads](https://www.eulesstx.gov/home/showpublishedimage/7366/638551873227700000)

Annabel Eads is a born and raised North Texan. Originally from Aledo, she earned a degree in Architecture from Texas Tech University in Lubbock, and started her career in construction management in Fort Worth. In 2019, she and her husband Kaleb moved to Euless with their two black labradors, Rosie and Riley. When the weather is good, she can be found walking her dogs on the City trails.

Prior to her election to the City Council, Annabel Eads served two years on the Zoning Board of Adjustment.

Council Member Eads enjoys spending time with her family and friends, and often hosts holidays and special events at her home. She can be seen at DFW Airport either heading to construction projects or visiting out-of-state family.

The City of Euless, TX
